Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo shook off a four-point first half and finished with 30 points and 12 rebounds as the Milwaukee Bucks rallied from a 19-point deficit and beat the Indiana Pacers 120-112 on Tuesday.
Post-Match Reflections: Giannis Antetokounmpo shook off a sluggish 1st half and led the Bucks to a comeback win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Milwaukee Bucks rallied from a 19-point deficit to beat the Indiana Pacers 120-112.
Others: The game was played at the Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis, IN, with an attendance of 17,274.
